<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Deceptive Worship](/Feats.aspx?ID=2120) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="General" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=78" />
<trait label="Skill" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=144" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 204 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
Trained in [Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11)

</column>

---

Members of your cult frequently pass themselves off as worshippers of other religions. You can use [Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11) instead of [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) to [Impersonate](/Actions.aspx?ID=46) a typical worshipper of another faith or to [Lie](/Actions.aspx?ID=47) specifically to claim you are a member of the faith you are Impersonating. You still need to use the Deception skill to Impersonate a specific worshipper or to perform other deceptive actions, such as attempting to Lie about any other matter.
name: Deceptive Worship
